0.text:
Innate: Twitch's basic attacks  on-hit apply a stack of Deadly Venom for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 6 times.
Deadly Venom: For each stack, the target is dealt「 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 (based on level) (+ 2.5% AP)  true damage per second over the duration, 」「 6 / 12 / 18 / 24 / 30 (based on level) (+ 15% AP)  total true damage over the duration, 」for a maximum of「 6 / 12 / 18 / 24 / 30 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) true damage with each tick. 」「 36 / 72 / 108 / 144 / 180 (based on level) (+ 90% AP) total true damage over the duration. 」This effect is considered a  poison.
0.html:
Innate: Twitch's basic attacks on-hit apply a stack of Deadly Venom for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 6 times.

Deadly Venom: For each stack, the target is dealt「 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 (based on level) (+ 2.5% AP)  true damage per second over the duration, 」「 6 / 12 / 18 / 24 / 30 (based on level) (+ 15% AP)  total true damage over the duration, 」for a maximum of「 6 / 12 / 18 / 24 / 30 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) true damage with each tick. 」「 36 / 72 / 108 / 144 / 180 (based on level) (+ 90% AP) total true damage over the duration. 」This effect is considered a poison.

0.text: Active: After a 1 second delay, Twitch becomes  camouflaged for a duration. Attacking or casting  Venom Cask or  Contaminate ends Ambush immediately.
0.html: Active: After a 1 second delay, Twitch becomes camouflaged for a duration. Attacking or casting Venom Cask or Contaminate ends Ambush immediately.
markedPassages: camouflaged
Venom Cask
Contaminate

1.text: During this time, Twitch gains  10% bonus movement speed, increased to 30% while facing enemy  champions within a 1000-unit radius who cannot see him.
1.html: During this time, Twitch gains  10% bonus movement speed, increased to 30% while facing enemy champions within a 1000-unit radius who cannot see him.
markedPassages: 10% bonus movement speed
champions

2.text: Upon breaking stealth, Twitch gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
2.html: Upon breaking stealth, Twitch gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

3.text: When an enemy  champion dies while afflicted with  Deadly Venom, Ambush's cooldown is  reset.
3.html: When an enemy champion dies while afflicted with Deadly Venom, Ambush's cooldown is  reset.
markedPassages: champion
Deadly Venom
reset

0.text: Active: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes at the target location, applying  Deadly Venom to enemies hit and granting  sight of the area.
0.html: Active: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes at the target location, applying Deadly Venom to enemies hit and granting sight of the area.
markedPassages: Deadly Venom
sight

1.text: The area then becomes contaminated for 3 seconds, applying a  Deadly Venom stack each second to enemies within and  slowing them.
1.html: The area then becomes contaminated for 3 seconds, applying a Deadly Venom stack each second to enemies within and slowing them.
markedPassages: Deadly Venom
slowing

0.text: Active: Twitch sends out a lethal toxin to each nearby enemy afflicted by  Deadly Venom, dealing each of them physical damage at the end of the cast time.
0.html: Active: Twitch sends out a lethal toxin to each nearby enemy afflicted by Deadly Venom, dealing each of them physical damage at the end of the cast time.
markedPassages: Deadly Venom

1.text: Contaminate deals additional physical damage and 33% AP magic damage for each stack of  Deadly Venom on the target.
1.html: Contaminate deals additional physical damage and 33% AP magic damage for each stack of Deadly Venom on the target.
markedPassages: Deadly Venom

2.text: A nearby enemy with  Deadly Venom is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be targeted by this ability.
2.html: A nearby enemy with Deadly Venom is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be visible to be targeted by this ability.
markedPassages: Deadly Venom
visible

0.text: Active: Twitch gains  bonus attack damage and  300 bonus attack range for 6 seconds, during which his  basic attacks are replaced by bolts that travel slightly further than his attack range in a straight line, dealing damage to every enemy unit hit.
0.html: Active: Twitch gains  bonus attack damage and  300 bonus attack range for 6 seconds, during which his basic attacks are replaced by bolts that travel slightly further than his attack range in a straight line, dealing damage to every enemy unit hit.
markedPassages: bonus attack damage
300 bonus attack range
basic attacks

1.text: The bolts deal 100% − 60% (based on enemies hit) of the attack's damage, apply  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness, and can  critically strike.
1.html: The bolts deal 100% − 60% (based on enemies hit) of the attack's damage, apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness, and can critically strike.
markedPassages: on-hit
critically strike

abilities.concerningText: Active: After a 1 second delay, Twitch becomes  camouflaged for a duration. Attacking or casting  Venom Cask or  Contaminate ends Ambush immediately.
Upon breaking stealth, Twitch gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
The area then becomes contaminated for 3 seconds, applying a  Deadly Venom stack each second to enemies within and  slowing them.
Active: Twitch sends out a lethal toxin to each nearby enemy afflicted by  Deadly Venom, dealing each of them physical damage at the end of the cast time.
Contaminate deals additional physical damage and 33% AP magic damage for each stack of  Deadly Venom on the target.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+8% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal ( 12% / 8%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 40 − 150 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (20 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal ( 12% /  8%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bring It Down: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BRING IT DOWN: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  625

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+45% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance
+7% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Wind's Fury: Basic attacks on-attack fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies in front of you, each dealing 40% AD physical damage. Bolts apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and are affected by critical strike modifiers.
The bolts will target the closest enemies to you that are not the main target.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – WIND'S FURY: Basic attacks on-attack fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies in front of you, each dealing 40% AD physical damage. Bolts apply  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and are affected by  critical strike modifiers.
The bolts will target the closest enemies to you that are not the main target.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
